nodes.title: Negative Prompt
widgets_values:
bright colors, overexposed, blurred details, subtitles, style, artwork, painting, picture, overall gray, worst quality, low quality, JPEG compression residue, ugly, incomplete, extra fingers, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn faces, deformed, disfigured, malformed limbs, fused fingers, cluttered background, three legs, many people in the background, walking backwards,

talking, bad anatomy, downsampling, aliasing, distorted, blurry, glossy, blur, jpeg artifacts, compression artifacts, poorly drawn, low-resolution, bad, distortion, bad eyes, blurry eyes, motion blur, badly drawn eyes,

nodes.title: GGUF Loaders Link
widgets_values:
## GGUF Diffusal Model

 >more than 24 gb Vram: Q8_0
 >\
 >16 gb Vram: Q5_K_M
 >\
 >less than 12 gb Vram: Q3_K_S

720p: [Link](https://huggingface.co/city96/Wan2.1-I2V-14B-720P-gguf/tree/main)


480p: [Link](https://huggingface.co/city96/Wan2.1-I2V-14B-480P-gguf/tree/main)

🗂️: models/unet

------------------------------------------------------------------

## Clip (GGUF):

 >more than 24 gb Vram: Q8_0
 >\
 >16 gb Vram: Q5_K_M
 >\
 >less than 12 gb Vram: Q3_K_S


[Link](https://huggingface.co/city96/umt5-xxl-encoder-gguf/tree/main)



🗂️: models/text_encoders

nodes.title: Known Errors:
widgets_values:
When you encountered this error:

> KSamplerAdvanced Expected all tensors to be on the same device, but found at least two devices, cpu and cuda:0! (when checking argument for argument mat1 in method wrapper_CUDA_addmm)

Disable/Delete BlockSwap and VRAM-Cleanup nodes.

Ensure you have enough VRAM.

@damiang

nodes.title: Frame Interpolation
widgets_values:
If you wish to use external Frame Interpolation. 

Set Interpolation Multiplier to 1.
\
Set Speed to 1.

----------------
Otherwise,

>2-3 Interpolation Multiplier for accelerated videos

>4-5 Interpolation Multiplier for slow down videos

> 2-4 Interpolation Multiplier for normal speed videos

nodes.title: Settings
widgets_values:
## Steps input:

>Start Steps: 5 \
End Steps: 3
 
are recommended from personal testing.

You can try:

>Start Steps: 4 \
End Steps: 3 

---
## Speed input:

>1 = normal speed

>more than 1 = accelerated motion but reduce video length

>Less than 1 = slow down motion but increase video length

-----
Try not go below 0.6 speed.

nodes.title: First Pass
widgets_values:
Disable to skip the 1st video combine.

Use when you want to upscale but don't want to have the un-scale video.

nodes.title: CFG Settings
widgets_values:
Default Start CFG 5. (3 - 6)
\
Do not change End CFG (1).







## 🚨 But if you find the loras you are using with this workflow are too aggressive (too much motion, color change, sudden exposure), lower down the Start CFG. 

3 seems good for some loras.

Alt between 5 and 3 and see which is better.

nodes.title: Torch Compile
widgets_values:
Only enable if your system support it.

Otherwise set it to disable.

nodes.title: CausVid Lora Strength Info
widgets_values:
## CausVid Lora Strength

0.3 Defualt.

>Range: 0.3 - 1

-----------------------------------
More strength might give more motion.

However, some lora can be overcooked when using higher strength.

If you experience grey out first few frames when using higher strength, reduce CausVid Lora Strength or set it to 0.3.

nodes.title: Block Swap Settings
widgets_values:
If you have memory issues, increase it - MAX 40.

Turn on everything.

14B Models have Max 40 Blocks.

If you have no VRAM issues.
Disable it.


  
🡻🡻🡻

nodes.title: # SAGE ATTENTION #
widgets_values:
🚨 Turn on Sage Attention if you have it installed. 

This is what I normally use:
>sageattn_qk_int8_pv_fp16_triton

nodes.title: Scale by
widgets_values:
Scale by Width and keep proportion.

Generally use when down scaling input Image.

Or just put the same width as your image to keep it the same.

Use dimension in the multiple of 16. Or it will be crop.

nodes.title: Color Match
widgets_values:
Usually use for sequencing video from last frame to have consistent color.

Can also use if you want color to be uniform through out the video, especially in some cases where color of the vid get gradually more saturated/bright.

nodes.title: Loras Link
widgets_values:
CausVid Lora :
[Link](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy/blob/main/Wan21_CausVid_14B_T2V_lora_rank32_v2.safetensors)
\
(Strength: 0.3)
\
For the 1st light purple lora loader.

Self Forcing Lora :
[Link](https://huggingface.co/Kijai/WanVideo_comfy/blob/main/Wan21_T2V_14B_lightx2v_cfg_step_distill_lora_rank32.safetensors)
\
(Strength: 1)
\
For the second light purple lora loader.

🗂️: models/loras

🡻🡻🡻

nodes.title: GGUF Model Connection
widgets_values:
If you do not want to install GGUF nodes. You can safely delete them.

Remember to connect them if you are using.
>Unet Loader to Block Swap (Green) 
\
Clip Loader to Set_Clip (Brown)

🡻🡻🡻
